game_description: This is a gorilla tag locomotion game where you walk with your hands and be a monkey!! There is a forest, you can do parkour, change your monkey fur with color changing, there is name changing cosmetics, and even a waterfall with a water slide!! Come join us on this monkey adventure and also, watch out for that pink bubble thing. It's very dangerous!!
review_1: (Devs). Please add a mod menu it would be fun that’s all bye
review_2: It was actually a good game but sadly got hacked and there is no more updates
review_3: The game used to be good. There was plenty of trees in the forest\jungle,the city was good, nothing too excessive and there was a mountain map that didn't have anything but a mountain and snow and it was pretty good for just talking to friends. But now it's just bad. The mod menu: gone before any mods. Platforms: gone. Now you just hold A and flap your arms (very not fun for my arms).
review_4: Ok this is just me ranting about the current update. 1: the high bridge is bugged, when you walk on it you get stuck. 2: the ice thing that leads to Desert looks like it’s from capuchin. 3: there are tunnels that just lead to the outside of the map so people can get out easily. 4: this game has 0 ORIGINALITY.￼ I dare you to change my mind about this game.
review_5: I don’t got much to say but it’s a pretty good game overall I really like it with the mod menu and platforms and stuff but the new owner is kind of toxic at least I think either I met him or met a guy that says he’s the owner but he’s not Love the mod menu but you got to add mods
